channel.title: mpeeples2008 on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in mpeeples2008 on open-archaeo

item.title: Binomial-Co-occurrence-Assessment
item.description: R script that implements a means for statistically assessing the degree of co-occurrence between classes within a dataset.

item.title: Bootstrap-Correspondence-Analysis
item.description: R-script for conducting and evaluating bootstrapped correspondence analyses.

item.title: Brainerd-Robinson-Similarity-Coefficient-and-Sampling-Error-Assessment
item.description: Script for calculating Brainerd-Robinson coefficients based on tabular count or percent data. This script also estimates the probability that a given difference between two samples is the product of sampling error.

item.title: Ceramic-Frequency-Date-Plot
item.description: This R script produces a exploratory visual for assessing site date ranges originally suggested to me by Wesley Bernardini Redlands University

item.title: Ford-Diagram
item.description: This R Function creates a simple Ford diagram for archaeological seriation with error bars determined based on sample size were count data are given

item.title: Kmeans
item.description: Script for conducting K-means cluster analysis using R. This script provides output designed to help the user select an appropriate cluster solution.

item.title: Mean-Ceramic-Date-and-Error-Estimation
item.description: Script for calculating mean ceramic dates based on tabular data. This script also estimates sampling error using a bootstrapping procedure.

item.title: NAA analytical dashboard
item.description: Analytical Dashboard for conducting various analysis to group and assess groupings for Neutron Activation Analytical chemical compositional data
